hanzi-su-wiki:
訴

Значения

Подавать жалобу, заявлять; взывать, обращаться к кому-либо

Мнемоника

Обращаться 言 в суд, чтобы недруга прогнали 斥, т.е. жаловаться.

Варианты

诉
purpleculture_pinyin:
sù
to complain; to sue; to tell
жаловаться; подавать в суд; сказать

(Simplified: 诉)

purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 斥 [ chì ] to scold, to upbraid; to accuse, to blame; to reproach
heisig_chinese_memo: Before you reprimand you usually accuse the person of something so they know what you are talking about.
heisig_constituent: accusation, say, words, keitai, mouth, reject, axe, drop
Keyword_KANJIDIC: accusation, sue, complain of pain, appeal to
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: обвинение, судиться, жалуется на боль, обращение к
koohiiStory1: I strongly reject the accusation implicit in your words.
koohiiStory2: Words that make you feel rejected.
jp_example_words:
訴え(うったえ): lawsuit, complaint
訴訟(そしょう): litigation, lawsuit
訴える(うったえる): sue (a person), resort to, appeal to
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You say you have an axe with a drop of blood on it. You hit someone with that axe and now they're going to sue you. That drop of blood on your axe is pretty incriminating, which is why they have enough of a case to sue you.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine being unable to stop yourself from saying "I have the axe with the drop on it!" and the recently axed person jumps out from behind a bush and shouts, "Aha! I'm gonna sue you!"
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You want to sue them back so you clean the axe with some soap (そ). "Your honor," you say in court, "I don't see any drops of blood, I countersue!"
WaniKani_Reading_Info: The person you axed cries and tries desperately to find their blood on the axe so they can keep suing you properly. You hold the soap behind your back and cackle.
Ru_Meaning: accusation, sue, complain of pain, appeal to
Ru_trainchinese: sù: (глаг) говорить; жаловаться, высказывать свое мнение; обвинять
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you reject (斥) the words (言) that accuse
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Words of a false accusation (accuse) can get you severly reprimanded.
humanum_short_description_en: " V " also known as " 𧪜 ", " let know ", meaning to tell, tell. "Shuowen": "Sue, sue also. From words, to save the sound. "The Analects" says: "The road to the son is in Jisun." " Sorrowful ".
humanum_short_description: 「訴」亦作「𧪜」、「愬」，意為告訴、訴說。《說文》：「訴，告也。从言，厈省聲。《論語》曰：『訴子路於季孫』。𧪜，訴或从言朔。愬，訴或从朔、心。」參見「愬」。

Shuowen 说文解字: 告也從言厈省聲論語曰訴子路於季孫臣鉉等曰厈非聲蓋古之字音多與今異如皀亦音香釁亦音門乃亦音仍他皆放此古今失傳不可詳究

訴字的基本解释

訴
sù
见“诉”。

訴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sù］
［《廣韻》桑故切，去暮，心。］
“诉1”的繁体字。
(1)告诉；诉说。
(2)引申为分辩，申辩。
(3)控告。
(4)谗害；毁谤。
(5)谓辞酒。
(6)求；求助。

訴字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　訴； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1152第13
【唐韻】桑故切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】蘇故切，?音素。【說文】吿也。【玉篇】論也，吿訴冤枉也。【廣韻】毀也。【左傳·成十六年】郤犫訴公于晉侯。【註】譖也。【史記·龜筴傳】王有德義，故來告訴。　又【說文】或作?。亦作愬。【論語】膚受之愬。【註】愬己之冤也。【前漢·五行志】引作訴。　又【韻會小補】通作遡。【戰國策】衞君跣行，告遡於魏。【註】遡愬同。　又【集韻】昌石切，音尺。亦毀也。　【說文】本作?。【字彙補】譌作辨，非。辨字左从言作。又?。

Name meaning

sù
вм. 诉
Radicals: 言, 斤, 丶  (say, axe, drop)
Meaning Mnemonic
You say you have an axe with a drop of blood on it. You hit someone with that axe and now they're going to sue you. That drop of blood on your axe is pretty incriminating, which is why they have enough of a case to sue you.
Imagine being unable to stop yourself from saying "I have the axe with the drop on it!" and the recently axed person jumps out from behind a bush and shouts, "Aha! I'm gonna sue you!"
Reading Mnemonic
You want to sue them back so you clean the axe with some soap (そ). "Your honor," you say in court, "I don't see any drops of blood, I countersue!"
The person you axed cries and tries desperately to find their blood on the axe so they can keep suing you properly. You hold the soap behind your back and cackle.
